text: The following lists events that happened in 1935 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Hermann Jónasson ==Events== ==Births== Friðrik Ólafsson *26 January - Friðrik Ólafsson, chess player, former president of FIDE *22 August - Árni Bergmann, writer *27 August - Óli Þorbjörn Guðbjartsson, politician. *7 September - Guðrún Helgadóttir, children's writer and politician. *24 September - Björn Helgason, footballer *31 October - Hjörleifur Guttormsson, politician. ===Full date missing=== *Eyvindur P. Eiríksson, writer ==Deaths== Jón Þorláksson *20 March - Jón Þorláksson, Prime Minister of Iceland 1926-1927 (b. 1877). *31 July - Tryggvi Þórhallsson, politician (b. 1889). ==References== Category:1930s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1935 in Iceland
